name: ShooterThing
description:
A Short and simple Bullet-hell game with one single resource for ammo, life and score.

This is the first game I've ever made so it is mainly a learning experience for me but I wanted to put it up here in order to get some feedback.

So if you played my little game and thought it sucked: please tell me why!

Or if for some reason you thought it was at least OK: please tell me why!

you can do so by writing me an email at: bartvanderW@gmail.com

The music is available here

And you can follow me on twitter or tumblr if you are interested in future games.
